channel.title: Spark on Andrew Goss · Senior Data Engineer in Boston

item.title: Udemy- Apache Spark 2.0 With Scala
item.author: andrewrgoss@gmail.com (Andrew Goss)
item.description:
COURSE LINK COURSE MATERIALS
Description Learn the concepts of Spark’s Resilient Distributed Datastores Get a crash course in the Scala programming language Develop and run Spark jobs quickly using Scala Translate complex analysis problems into iterative or multi-stage Spark scripts Scale up to larger data sets using Amazon’s Elastic MapReduce service Understand how Hadoop YARN distributes Spark across computing clusters Practice using other Spark technologies, like Spark SQL, DataFrames, DataSets, Spark Streaming, and GraphX What am I going to get from this course?
